message.msgid: Account and password can not be empty
message.msgstr: Account and password can not be empty!

message.msgid: Wireless password can not be empty
message.msgstr: Wireless password can not be empty!

message.msgid: the password can only be 8 characters in length
message.msgstr: the password can only be 8 characters in length!

message.msgid: No Ethernet cable connected to WAN port!
message.msgstr: No Ethernet cable connected to WAN port!

message.msgid: No Internet access, please check your online settings!
message.msgstr: No Internet access, please check your online settings!

message.msgid: Password can not exceed 12 characters in length!
message.msgstr: Password can not exceed 12 characters in length!
Interface: three types of interfaces are provided:vlan2: WAN interface, ppp0:PPPoE interface, br0:LAN interface.

message.msgid: the specified static routing already exists
message.msgstr: the specified static routing already exists.

Static Routing: When there are several routers in the network, you need to set static routing. It makes sure the data go through the router’s path. You can use this feature to allow different IP domain name users to access the Internet via this device. Please be cautious while setting.

In most cases, dynamic routing is recommended, because this feature allows the router to detect the physical changes of the network layout automatically. If you want to use static routing, make sure the router’s DHCP function is disabled. The settings will be effective after rebooting the router.

message.msgid: Starting Port large than Ending Port

message.msgstr: Port range forwarding sets up public services on your network, such as web servers, ftp servers, e-mail servers, and other specialized Internet applications. When you have set up one service, then the communication requests from the Internet to your router’s WAN port will be converted to the specified LAN IP address.
Start port- End port:WAN service port.
Enable:select to bring the settings into effect.
Delete:It helps you to clear the settings,click Save to make it effective.
Add to :It helps you to add the well-known service port to the start port field of the item you are setting.

message.msgid: Can not use the router IP address
message.msgstr: Can not use the router’s IP address!

message.msgid: not in the same segment with LAN IP
message.msgstr: not in the same segment with LAN IP!
NOTE: When the DMZ host is enabled, the firewall settings of the DMZ host will not function.

Sometimes you need to completely expose one LAN computer to the Internet so that it can communicate with the computers on the Internet. Then you can set the computer as DMZ host.Enter the IP address of the DMZ host.When you enable DMZ, actually you close the device’s firewall protection against the DMZ host.
(Universal Plug and Play) allows automatically detecting and setting the devices that are connected to the network. Currently UPnP is only supported by Windows ME and Windows XP or later systems.

message.msgid: the length is not within the range
message.msgstr: the length is not within the range!

message.msgid: Reboot the router to bring the settings into effect ,reboot now
message.msgstr: Reboot the router to bring the settings into effect ,reboot now?

message.msgid: Reboot wireless module to bring the settings into effect ,reboot now
message.msgstr: Reboot wireless module to bring the settings into effect ,reboot now?

message.msgid: remarks can only consist of numbers ,letters and underlines
message.msgstr: remarks can only consist of numbers ,letters and underlines!

message.msgid: The MAC address belongs to reserved addresses, please re-enter
message.msgstr: The MAC address belongs to reserved addresses, please re-enter!

message.msgid: The MAC address belongs to multicast addresses, please re-enter
message.msgstr: The MAC address belongs to multicast addresses, please re-enter!
